attributes.action: David Davies to honour his pledge of solidarity with Damian Green & resign.
attributes.background: BREXIT Secretary David Davies pledged that should Damian Green be forced to resign, he would follow suit in an act of solidarity. Trust in our MP’s is vital & following the BREXIT impact assessments that didn’t exist & back tracking on the Phase 1 deal, how can the public or the EU trust Davies?

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP and/or Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
